name: Parlor! Pro 3
overview: Parlor! Pro 3 is the third game of the series of the same name released for the Playstation console and is a gambling game that features 2 different gambling machines: The Legend of UFO & Million Slots. The game features also a sort of a story mode called The Phenomenon in which the player is a pachinko gambler that wants to earn a lot of money playing in the different gambling machines that are around the town. To go around the town the player is in a sort of board game that can advance through different squares depending of the number that he gets in the machine.
